name: Death's Gunman
description:
After you died, Death offers a change to reborn by doing her dirty work, killing the fouls that discovered ways to live longer.

Created by ODONT & Fernando Filho for the IGMC : Rebirth.

Story and Events By ODONT

Sprites and Artwork by Fernando Filho

Extra Artwork by Ermac Cedilha & RedShoT99 (@rabisco1988)

This game was created with Rpg Maker MZ
